content: The Crowning Glory A quarterly e-Newsletter of IITH ISSN: 2583-7222 (Online) - Volume 5 | Issue 4 | Oct - Dec 2023
Catalysis Research @IITH - किरIITH is now an E-ISSN journal. All the issues since 2020 qualified for the ISSN parameter. Each issue is being dedicated to one of the thrust research areas of IITH.
Catalysis Research @IITH - Following this precedence, we are back with yet another critical area of research at IITH, “Catalysis@IITH” - Vol - 5, Issue-4, 2023 (Issue - 17).

Catalysis Research @IITH - Catalysis has become an indispensable research area in many departments at IITH, including Chemistry, Chemical Engineering, Materials Science, Biotechnology, Climate Change, and Civil Engineering.

Catalysis Research @IITH - Thus, catalysis provides a vibrant platform at IITH to foster inter-and trans-disciplinary collaborations among the different departments from fundamental catalysis science to generate innovative technology transfer, in line with the circular economy goals.
